name: Eton
0:
”Alexa, turn on Nightlight”
”Alexa, set Nightlightto 50 percent”
”Alexa, dim Nightlightby 10 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill and Alexa, you can control your Eton devices, and change its color by using the following Alexa skill commands as example: 

"Alexa, turn on Nightlight"
"Alexa, set Nightlight to 50 percent"
"Alexa, dim Nightlight by 10 percent"
"Alexa, brighten Nightlight by 90 percent"

Eton Device is required.

Download Eton app on Android Play Store or iOS App Store for more instruction on how to setup and use Alexa voice commands to control Eton Smart Devices.
